rComments: Great Professor, there is alot of work although it is doable and there is alot of help available through TAs and Professor.  If you show your work you will always get partial credit and may even get extra credit so its worth it to do. Very passionate about the topic and fun to be in class.

Manfred was a joy to have. There are 8 homeworks, 1 midterm and 1 final. The homeworks are assigned weekly like clockwork--uploaded Tuesday night and due next Tuesday. They took me at least 5-10 hours to complete each (also, they were doable). The exams were fair--just be sure to know the material in-and-out.
You have to really study for this class. The lectures are interesting, but need the textbook to supplement them. One slide in graph analysis that I thought was quite sexist - not forgiven.

Syllabus: 30% hwk 30%midterm 40%. Do the hwk, go to lss and msi to get great understanding. Study his practice test, test are fair but graded seriously, no partial credit for any doodling. More understanding and "easier" than some of the other professors. Going to take him for 102 next quarter:)

Hardest professor I've ever had. Yet he made the course a lot of fun. Truly wants us to learn, and really pushes the students. Lots of work, but he made it a great learning experience.  A bit crazy, but he's a great guy.
Best professor ever. Super enthusiastic about teaching and your learning. Threw a party at his house for us at the end of the year. Take 101 with him if you can!

CMPS102 was a difficult class, luckily Manfred is an excellent teacher and his TA Adam was amazing.  The material was dense, you have to go to class and take notes and read the book everyday if you want an A in this class.  Manfred is a truly passionate on the subject and has many hobbies he is somehow able to relate to this material.

Definitely a tough teacher but the previous comments were pretty libelous. He checked the phone for time and is not vengeful. He wants his students to succeed but can assume too much from them and lecture over people's heads. The TA helped tremendously for this class. It was one of my toughest classes but he really challenged me.

He seems to be very interested in the topics unfortunately he is not clear. It is best to do a lot more researches after class. It is best to have 3 days working hard on the HW because it worth 40%. The midterm and final are covered everything that in the book, not just what he teaches in class. Take cs 130 or AMS class instead of this one ;)

This teach can not teach. Fact: He opens his cell phone every 20 mins wtf is that? He talks unrelated stuffs in class about his life. Most of the time you have to use google. He DOES NOT CURVE MUCH. Most of the people around me has 20-70% in midterm.  AVERAGE IS 40%. Passing grade is 50%. GL if u ever take this teacher. HE FAIL HALF OF THE CLASS.

This teacher is really bad. FACTS: Half of class was missing on the 2nd half of the quarter after the midterm. He did a mafia something at his home, but nobody in class went , so i think he take it personally and make the final 7 pages long which is longer than his previous finals. I go to class everyday but I learn from google more than him alot.

He is very enthusiastic about the material and cares about students. Unforunately he is not very clear and is hard to understand. His class isn't too hard if you put in the work, there are next to no tricks on exams, and he will happily meet with you outside of class to help you.

The most absent-minded professor that I've ever had. VERY Unclear and Disorganized. As I recall, I think the class average on his midterm exam was less than 50%, and the final wasn't much better. Going to class was a total waste of time, as nobody could follow what he was saying.
